name: Round Trip (itch)
description:
Created for 1 Minute Game Jam.

Traverse randomly generated paths with only actions:

         [SPACE] to turn left. 

         [W] to boost.

Two game modes:

         [ZEN] - go back and forth in this relaxing experience.

         [RUSH] - travel as fast as possible, and don't get consumed by the Red! Might be easier if you try Zen mode first.

Credits:

"Explosion, 8-bit, 01.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

"expressions of the mind (Piano loop)" by ShadyDave (soundcloud.com/lustersound) of Freesound.org

"Dramatic Music" by PureDesignGirl of Freesound.org

"Relaxing Short Music" by Theo Teravainen of Freesound.org
